translations: 诽谤的；诽谤性的；中伤的

sentences.sentence: Herr Kohler wanted an explanation for what he described as "slanderous" remarks.
sentences.translation: 科勒先生要求那些他称之为“造谣中伤”的言论作出一个解释。

sentences.sentence: No one believes your slanderous talk anyway!
sentences.translation: 不管你怎么说， 也没有人听信你这谗言!

sentences.sentence: This is a slanderous misrepresentation of our policy.
sentences.translation: 这是对我们的政策的恶意歪曲。
